title: RestructuringEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the form of the restructuring credit event that is applicable to the credit default swap.

oneOf.title: ModModR
oneOf.description: Restructuring (Section 4.7) and Modified Restructuring Maturity Limitation and Conditionally Transferable Obligation (2014 Definitions: Section 3.31, 2003 Definitions: 2.32) apply.

oneOf.title: ModR
oneOf.description: Restructuring (Section 4.7) and Restructuring Maturity Limitation and Fully Transferable Obligation (2014 Definitions: Section 3.31, 2003 Definitions: 2.32) apply.

oneOf.title: R
oneOf.description: Restructuring as defined in the applicable ISDA Credit Derivatives Definitions. (2003 or 2014).
